g.text: PRISMi : Partial of a PRISM. Each node holds a PRISMi
encMsg1 : Encrypted Prize "The iTunes card code is "
node1 : Exposed - will reveal a part of the Secret
Test if IP needs to be throttled
If criteria met and IP is not throttled
Apply the Pseudorandom Function (PRF) to the gBlurPass.
[Criteria not met or IP is throttled
Send random response and throttled time.
If server exposed, send partial PRISM
